name: Favonius Warbow

refinement_effect.refine_one: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: CRIT hits have a 70% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: CRIT hits have an 80% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: CRIT hits have a 90% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: CRIT hits have a 100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

description: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.
